label: 天草鎮尚
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (bapitized Miguel in 1571, d. 1582) [A] baron in the orbit of the Shimazu of Satsuma who had his main residence at Kawachi no Ura on one of the Amakusa Islands.  [He] was persuaded in 1577 to undertake the wholesale Christianization of his subjects (p. 33). [島津、薩摩、河内浦、天草]
